body:
I would start by looking at related project has you are not the only one who are interested in it ; for example : 
- https://multithreaded.stitchfix.com/blog/2017/07/26/nodebook/

I know there are more around. It is a complex enough problem that a team of interested people are more change to do something that work.

I've recently learn about http://gittup.org/tup/, which seem to be able to intercept IO operation (which is one of the reason why dependency tracking is hard). 

As you guessed, this is likely both a backend and frontend extension, though if you "tag" manually, it should be doable only as frontend-only extension. You'll have to play with the `Cell.prototype.execute`method and make it submit dependent cells if these have not been executed.

Hope that give you something to start with.
